characterList: 睡今含念陰蔭西要腰票漂標賈價煙

characters.story: Like an eye, this character means to sleep and shouts "Shway!"!
The strokes unite to show now, singing "Jin!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
"Hahn, are you keeping it?" The mouth questioned now curiously - harboring and containing!
"Nyen!" The heart commanded now sharply - to miss, recall and wish!
See how the wall forms yin? It sings "Yin!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
See how the shelter forms shady? It shouts "Yin!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
The strokes unite to show west, singing "Shee!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
A striking symbol for want that shouts "Yao!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
The body stands for waist, singing "Yao!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
Picture ticket taking form - it shouts "Pyao!" with vivid energy!
"Pyao!" Water carried the ticket sharply - drifting and floating, tossed about!
Like a tree, this character means a mark and sings "Byao!" - a vivid image to remember!
Like a shellfish, this character means merchant and whispers "Goo"!
Like a person, this character means price and shouts "Jyah!"!
The fire takes the shape of the smoke, singing "Yan" cheerfully!
